response.original_title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: Big Rig to the Rescue!
response.overview: Urgent deliveries are needed all over Axle City, but the cargo's too heavy for a normal monster machine to carry. This sounds like a job for - Big Rig Blaze. But can our big rig heroes get over the draw bridge, make it through the gorilla-filled tunnel, and burst through a giant wall of rocks to make the deliveries in time?
response.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: Big Rig to the Rescue!
